mcciutils.config.enableDiscordStatus.lin: Toggles the Discord Status on and off.
mcciutils.config.customDetails.line2: USERNAME: Shows the username of the player
mcciutils.config.customDetails.line3: MOD_VERSION: Shows the version of the mod
mcciutils.config.friendNotificationOptio: POPUP: Shows a popup when a friend joins/leaves
SOUND: Plays a sound when a friend joins/leaves
mcciutils.config.enableChatMentions.line: COLOR: Colors the username in chat when mentioned
SOUND: Plays a sound when you are mentioned in chat
mcciutils.config.chatMentionColor.line1: Changes the color of the chat mention
mcciutils.config.questNotificationOption: POPUP: Shows a popup when a quest is completed
SOUND: Plays a sound when a quest is completed
mcciutils.config.achievementNotification: POPUP: Shows a popup when an achievement is unlocked
SOUND: Plays a sound when an achievement is unlocked
mcciutils.config.stackSpam.line3: OFF: Disables stacking of duplicate messages
mcciutils.config.autoGG.line1: Automatically types "gg" in chat when a game ends
mcciutils.config.hideSlotHighlight.line1: Hides the hovered slot highlight in inventories when they have no item in them
mcciutils.config.hidePanorama.line1: Sets the panorama back to Minecraft's default
